content:
TITLE: Installing Internet Archive Package via pipx
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the internetarchive package using pipx package manager for isolated Python application installation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jjjake/internetarchive/blob/master/README.rst#2025-04-20_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
$ pipx install internetarchive
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Handling File-like Objects in Upload Function
DESCRIPTION: Fixes a bug in Item.upload_file() where the checksum parameter was being incorrectly set to True if it was None. Allows proper handling of file-like objects during upload.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jjjake/internetarchive/blob/master/HISTORY.rst#2025-04-20_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: Python
CODE:
```
Item.upload_file()
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Parsing S3 XML Errors in Python
DESCRIPTION: Uses the internetarchive.utils.get_s3_xml_text() function to parse XML error responses from S3. Handles cases where the response does not contain XML, such as 5xx errors, by always returning the HTTPError.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jjjake/internetarchive/blob/master/HISTORY.rst#2025-04-20_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: Python
CODE:
```
internetarchive.utils.get_s3_xml_text()
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing internetarchive Library as Editable Package
DESCRIPTION: These commands navigate to the cloned internetarchive directory and install the library as an editable package using pip, allowing for development and testing.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jjjake/internetarchive/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.rst#2025-04-20_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
$ cd internetarchive
$ pip install -e .
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Tests for internetarchive Library
DESCRIPTION: This command runs the tests for the internetarchive library using pytest with PEP8 style checking enabled.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jjjake/internetarchive/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.rst#2025-04-20_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
$ py.test --pep8
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Internet Archive CLI Binary
DESCRIPTION: Series of commands to download the Internet Archive CLI binary directly from archive.org, make it executable, and verify the installation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jjjake/internetarchive/blob/master/README.rst#2025-04-20_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
$ curl -LO https://archive.org/download/ia-pex/ia
$ chmod +x ia
$ ./ia --help
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting Default Timeout for S3 Overload Check
DESCRIPTION: Adds a default timeout to the ArchiveSession.s3_is_overloaded() method. If the request times out, it now returns True to indicate that S3 is overloaded.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jjjake/internetarchive/blob/master/HISTORY.rst#2025-04-20_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: Python
CODE:
```
ArchiveSession.s3_is_overloaded()
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Handling Unicode in CSV Processing
DESCRIPTION: Adds Unicode support to 'ia upload --spreadsheet' and 'ia metadata --spreadsheet' commands using the backports.csv module for improved compatibility.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jjjake/internetarchive/blob/master/HISTORY.rst#2025-04-20_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: Python
CODE:
```
backports.csv
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing and Running Tox for Multi-version Testing
DESCRIPTION: These commands install tox and use it to run tests against all supported Python versions as defined in tox.ini for the internetarchive library.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jjjake/internetarchive/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.rst#2025-04-20_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
$ pip install tox
$ tox
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Test Dependencies for internetarchive Library
DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to install the minimal requirements for running tests on the internetarchive library using pip. It includes pytest, pytest-pep8, and responses packages.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jjjake/internetarchive/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.rst#2025-04-20_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
$ pip install pytest pytest-pep8 responses
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining Python Dependencies in requirements.txt
DESCRIPTION: This requirements.txt file lists the Python packages needed to run the internetarchive project. It specifies version constraints for each dependency, ensuring compatibility.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jjjake/internetarchive/blob/master/pex-requirements.txt#2025-04-20_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: requirements
CODE:
```
charset-normalizer==2.1.1
jsonpatch>=0.4
requests>=2.25.0,<3.0.0
setuptools
tqdm>=4.0.0
urllib3>=1.26.0
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Cloning the internetarchive Library Repository
DESCRIPTION: This command clones the internetarchive library repository from GitHub to the local machine using git.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jjjake/internetarchive/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.rst#2025-04-20_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
$ git clone https://github.com/jjjake/internetarchive
```
